programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw 3D
programme.desc: A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: The living dead regroup above while humans (Lori Cardille, Terry Alexander, Joseph Pilato) sweat it out below in a Florida missile silo.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: Frank Castle, known as the Punisher, ruthlessly demolishes organized crime, but it starts an even bigger war.

programme.title: Death on the Border
programme.desc: On the U.S.-Mexican border, two women risk their lives to rescue a group of young girls from a sinister human trafficking network.

programme.title: El Rey's Top 5
programme.desc: Host Vanessa Gritton and her guests Janel SantaCruz and Dan Mills list their top 5 arcade games.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno is sent to capture Enrique Vilas, the reputed "Butcher of San Remas," who escaped from El Salvador with a $100,000 bounty on his head.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: A mother seeking revenge for her son's death puts her life in jeopardy until Reno shows up to help her apprehend the killer.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno discovers that a racketeer he is tracking is also wanted by a crime boss for stealing his girlfriend.

programme.title: The Fanatic
programme.desc: Moose is a rabid movie fan who's obsessed with meeting his favorite celebrity action hero, Hunter Dunbar. When Moose's actions begin to take a darker turn, Dunbar soon finds himself at the mercy of his increasingly dangerous stalker.

programme.title: Romeo Is Bleeding
programme.desc: A double life catches up to a New York policeman (Gary Oldman) when he meets a mob hit-woman (Lena Olin) from Moscow.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: The living dead regroup above while humans (Lori Cardille, Terry Alexander, Joseph Pilato) sweat it out below in a Florida missile silo.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Sam Childers (Gerard Butler), a former biker, travels to Africa to establish an orphanage for young victims of war.

programme.title: I Am Wrath
programme.desc: A man sets out to get his own justice after police are unable to catch his wife's killer.

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: After a successful mission to free a Chinese hostage, a highly trained operative (Gina Carano) is betrayed and left for dead by someone in her own agency.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Joey, an alcoholic war veteran assumes a new identity after returning from a traumatic tour in Afghanistan and becomes a vigilante in a bid to atone for his sins.
